entry.source: {F812}K\0{F87A,22}{F813,0,60001}Ah, welcome.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,60002}...I've received the quest from that{F801}Hugo.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,60003}This blackboard was meant to give{F801}Samurai a bit of fun...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,60004}Yet he's gone and defaced it with this{F801}official business. Seems there's naught{F801}the Monastery won't try to control.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}K\0{F87A,22}{F813,0,60001}Ah, welcome.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,60002}...I've received the quest from that{F801}Hugo.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,60003}This blackboard was meant to give{F801}Samurai a bit of fun...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,60004}Yet he's gone and defaced it with this{F801}official business. Seems there's naught{F801}the Monastery won't try to control.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Walter, Jonathan, and Isabeau are{F801}standing in front of the blackboard.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Walter, Jonathan, and Isabeau are{F801}standing in front of the blackboard.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F87B,5,1,1,2}{F813,0,60005}Ah, you're here. Isabeau was just{F801}telling us something interesting.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F87B,5,1,1,2}{F813,0,60005}Ah, you're here. Isabeau was just{F801}telling us something interesting.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,3}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,60006}Something I heard from the other master{F801}Samurai... They say the Monastery's{F801}request has a hidden motive to it.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,3}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,60006}Something I heard from the other master{F801}Samurai... They say the Monastery's{F801}request has a hidden motive to it.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,60008}Relics akin to Gauntlets...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,60009}They are extraordinarily valuable{F801}finds which cannot be created by{F801}our artisans' skill.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,60008}Relics akin to Gauntlets...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,60009}They are extraordinarily valuable{F801}finds which cannot be created by{F801}our artisans' skill.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,3}{F813,0,60010}The Monastery has never been public{F801}about their desire, but they have{F801}always been researching these relics.{F801}{F802}{F87B,5,10,1,1}{F813,0,60011}They would move heaven and earth to{F801}get their hands on one.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,3}{F813,0,60010}The Monastery has never been public{F801}about their desire, but they have{F801}always been researching these relics.{F801}{F802}{F87B,5,10,1,1}{F813,0,60011}They would move heaven and earth to{F801}get their hands on one.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F813,0,60012}Thus, the hunt for the Black Samurai--{F801}it is a veil that allows them to order{F801}us to break our code.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F813,0,60012}Thus, the hunt for the Black Samurai--{F801}it is a veil that allows them to order{F801}us to break our code.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,60013}Hence the lengths they went to,{F801}issuing the quest and providing such{F801}a generous reward...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,60013}Hence the lengths they went to,{F801}issuing the quest and providing such{F801}a generous reward...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,3}{F813,0,60014}The Black Samurai's emergence may in{F801}truth be cause for celebration at the{F801}Monastery.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,60015}Even some of the masters say so.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,3}{F813,0,60014}The Black Samurai's emergence may in{F801}truth be cause for celebration at the{F801}Monastery.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,60015}Even some of the masters say so.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,60016}Hoy, {F843,0}. Do you think that{F801}we should go through with the{F801}Monastery's quest?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,60016}Hoy, {F843,0}. Do you think that{F801}we should go through with the{F801}Monastery's quest?{F801}

entry.source: "We should."{F801}"It is unseemly."{F801}
entry.target: "We should."{F801}"It is unseemly."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,3,1,1}{F813,0,60019}I, too, had my doubts at first.{F801}But then again...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,3,1,1}{F813,0,60019}I, too, had my doubts at first.{F801}But then again...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F813,0,60021}The code is all well and good, but{F801}I'm in this for the fun of it.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F813,0,60021}The code is all well and good, but{F801}I'm in this for the fun of it.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,2}{F813,0,60022}If you all are going, then I may as{F801}well accompany you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,2}{F813,0,60022}If you all are going, then I may as{F801}well accompany you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F813,0,60023}Very good. Let's register the quest{F801}on our Gauntlets.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F813,0,60023}Very good. Let's register the quest{F801}on our Gauntlets.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}raised their Gauntlets to the blackboard.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}raised their Gauntlets to the blackboard.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,400050}I'll register that as a new quest{F801}on the list.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,400050}I'll register that as a new quest{F801}on the list.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Walter, Jonathan, and Isabeau are now{F801}traveling with you.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Walter, Jonathan, and Isabeau are now{F801}traveling with you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,0,60007}Some whisper that there are mystic{F801}relics buried in the Unclean Ones'{F801}country.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,0,60007}Some whisper that there are mystic{F801}relics buried in the Unclean Ones'{F801}country.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F813,0,60018}If it's for the good of the people,{F801}we haven't really a choice.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F813,0,60018}If it's for the good of the people,{F801}we haven't really a choice.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F813,0,60020}If it's for the good of the people,{F801}we haven't really a choice.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F813,0,60020}If it's for the good of the people,{F801}we haven't really a choice.{F801}
